text: my name is rishir patel i'm a worldwide
security specialist with aws and i lead
the business development program for our
data protection services
my career before aws i spent several
years as an engineer figuring out what i
was good at
and then i ended up going back to
business school for my mba and
transitioned into a product management
role and then eventually made my way to
aws
biggest surprise since i joined aws is
just the sheer velocity and speed that
everything moves at everybody here works
really quickly engineering turns around
products and feature improvements
extremely quickly and that makes it
really easy to be a customer-facing
security specialist because we're able
to solve customer problems
much quicker than i ever could in the
past
a big part of aws culture is that
builder mentality so go in and getting
hands-on with aws solutions building new
architectures and solving problems with
the technology itself
i've been going around with my security
colleagues to try and get them to to
apply here and mainly what i tell them
is that this is a really good place to
be for personal and professional growth
whether you want to spend you know a
year or two at aws or 10 years
there's some really valuable skills that
you're going to gain while you're here
that are going to benefit you for the
rest of your career in your life
[Music]
[Applause]
